tags: NOT A PROCUREMENT FOR INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
this is a government required contract
full_summary:
Tender Details
---------------

* **Project Title (English)**: Office Furniture Acquisition under a Supply Arrangement
* **Project Title (French)**: Acquisition de produits d'ameublement sous un arrangement en approvisionnement
* **Reference Number**: WS4283003186-Doc4288794183
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: 2023-11-02
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-22T14:00:00 (now expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-12-14
* **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A

Category and Description
-------------------------

* **UNSPSC Category**: Monitor arms or stands, Accommodation furniture, Chairs, Tables, Filing cabinets or accessories, Conferencing tables, Pedestals, Furniture tops or work surfaces, Commercial and industrial furniture, Work surfaces for panel systems

Trade Agreements
-----------------

* **Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement**: Eligible
* **Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement**: Eligible
* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**: Eligible
* **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement**: Eligible
* **Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement**: Eligible
* **Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement**: Eligible

Procurement Details
-------------------

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest price
* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

Bidder Eligibility
------------------

* Only suppliers who have been pre-qualified and have been issued a supply arrangement may submit a bid.
* Non-SA holders may submit a bid to the Identified User (IU) but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation.

Government Agency Details
-----------------------

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Maryse Cyr
	+ Email: maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: N/A

Tender Description
-------------------

The Government of Canada is soliciting a Request for Proposal for office furniture acquisition under a supply arrangement. The requirement includes products from various UNSPSC categories, including interconnecting panels, freestanding systems, tables, filing cabinets, and ancillary products. The successful supplier must deliver and install the furniture in Nova Scotia
